intro.title: What is Clean DDD?
intro.paragraph1: Clean Domain-Driven Design (DDD) combines the strategic design principles of DDD with clean architecture patterns to create software systems that are both aligned with business needs and technically sound.
intro.paragraph2: Our community is dedicated to exploring and evolving these practices, providing resources and knowledge sharing for practitioners at all levels.
intro.coreConceptsDescription: The Clean DDD approach organizes code around business domains while maintaining separation of concerns through architectural boundaries.
